column1: '''''-ndil, -nil, -dil''''' is a [[Quenya]] suffix added to names to indicate friendship, love, or devotion to an object, idea, grouping, course, occupation or spirit ([[Ainur]]) to which one is devoted for its own sake<ref>{{L
* [[Elendil]] = "Friend of the stars", also understood as "[[Elf-friend]]"
